definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: We do not have a bath tub, nor a shower on the train.
sentences.chinese: 车上没有浴盆，也没有沐浴设备。

sentences.english: emptying buckets and baths, and storing them upside-down.
sentences.chinese: 排空水桶和浴盆，倒置存放。

sentences.english: The water ran steaming into the tub.
She filled the tub, put in a few drops of lavender oil, and washed me.
sentences.chinese: 她灌满了浴盆，倒了几滴薰衣草油，为我洗起来。

sentences.english: The water was rising quickly and the tub was almost full.
sentences.chinese: 水很快就升起来，浴盆差不多满了。

sentences.english: Hang a couple of bird feeders in a tree and set up a bird bath.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在树上悬挂几个喂食器或放置一个小鸟浴盆。

sentences.english: ET: Plus, you have a cute little bathtub scene that's kind of racy.
sentences.chinese: 加上，你有点小可爱的浴盆的场面有些越级。

sentences.english: Constellation rooms come with an alfresco terrace tub.
sentences.chinese: 以星座命名的房间佩有露天阶梯式浴盆。

sentences.english: A maker or repairer of barrels and tubs; a cooper.
sentences.chinese: 一个以制造或修理木桶或浴盆为业的工匠。

sentences.english: The designer bathrooms were very useable and clean, and even have bidets.
sentences.chinese: 这里的浴室使用方便，而且干净，甚至有浴盆。

sentences.english: Though I keep telling older people that the bidet helps with constipation.
sentences.chinese: 即使我不断的告诉老人们这个做浴盆对便秘有好处。

sentences.english: Please puts the bathtub the water, the pouring wet all goods spare.
sentences.chinese: 请将浴盆放好水，浇湿所有的物品备用。

sentences.english: She got out of the bath and towelled herself dry.
sentences.chinese: 她从浴盆出来并用毛巾把身上擦干。

sentences.english: It's a single room with a bath, facing the south.
sentences.chinese: 一个朝南的带浴盆的单人间。

sentences.english: Modern tubs and sinks can change the look of an old bathroom and make it look new.
sentences.chinese: 现代浴盆和水槽可以改变面貌的老浴室使它寻找新的。

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
